attributes.action: reject the proposal for unitary status for Wiltshire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposal fails to consult YOU, the local electorate, is dubious on cost savings and will result in even more distant local democracy if approved!

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "reject the proposal for unitary status for Wiltshire."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13097.asp

Prime Minister's Office
